ZingPR helps brands connect with customers, build awareness, shape perceptions, and drive demand. We work with startups and early-stage businesses that need creative and expert PR, content development and brand storytelling — without the overhead of a large PR agency.

Stryker-Munley Group offers clients the best and brightest public relations and marketing professionals from across the country. The depth of our experience and our commitment to service and success sets us apart from other national agencies. Each SMG client is served by professionals with more than 20 years of experience in their industry.Eight offices are strategically located in New York, Memphis, St. Louis, Silicon Valley, Chicago, Los Angeles, Pittsburgh and Sacramento.

I help raise awareness for the Cleantech Open by keeping influential journalists, bloggers, and industry movers & shakers up to date on our programs and startups. In addition to working with alumni companies and sponsors, I liaise with the many other talented volunteers at this amazing organization as we work to establish the Cleantech Open as the world's largest and most effective cleantech accelerator. This is a (highly rewarding) volunteer role.

recommendations: Rex Northen
Cleantech Open Global at Cleantech Open
February 18, 2016, Rex managed Tim directly

Tim has been national PR Chair for the Cleantech Open since 2009, making him one of our longest-standing volunteers, and a linchpin in this organization's mission to save the planet through the work of fine entrepreneurs.Tim - thank you for all you've done over all these years. Thank you for the way you go about capturing the right story for the right media, and the organization and professionalism you've brought to blog posts and news. Thank you also for the 'Meet the Finalists' blog series, for your indomitable grasp of the distant and delicate corners of English grammar, and for all the fun you bring to everything you touch. It's been a singular pleasure working with you, and I am eternally grateful.It's only taken me seven years to write this recommendation. In part, because I'm clearly hopeless at keeping up with the multifarious forms of communication that social media has now thrown at me on top of phone and email (which were already quite enough, thank you). But more importantly because Tim, and a remarkable team of volunteer PR chairs in the regions, have done such a consistently remarkable job of staying on top of social media on our behalf.

Amrit Robbins
President, Co-Founder at Axiom Exergy
June 8, 2015, Amrit was a client of Tim’s

Tim held our hands through our first press release. He educated us on the entire process, helped us to determine our PR goals, generated interest among many relevant publications (including some of the most prestigious publications in the energy/cleantech space), drafted the document, coordinated the document revision process, and coordinated the release itself. Ultimately, our press release was widely published and generated a great deal of interest among potential customers and prospective partners.Tim understands the needs of young companies, and he has special expertise in energy/cleantech.

Ben Busse
Product Manager, Technologist, Open Source Evangelist
December 30, 2014, Ben was a client of Tim’s

Tim has helped us tremendously with our PR activities at DreamFactory (a 20 person Bay Area startup as of 2014). I highly recommend Tim if you're looking for an experienced and hands on PR consultant, particularly if you're a startup or growth-stage company. Tim is highly effective because he's strategic and adept at prioritizing activities and getting things done in a targeted, pragmatic way. He's also an excellent writer. Specific activities Tim has led at DreamFactory include:* Planning and implementing our strategic PR plan* Leading and refining our positioning and messaging to analysts, customers, and press * Quickly learning about our domain (open source backend technology for enterprise mobile apps) and mapping out a specific media plan to engage with target customers* Engaging many influential reporters and bloggers about our company and product* Securing coverage in online publications and blogs* Managing our analyst relationshipsTim is a PR professional and comes highly recommended.

Ann Smith
Full-Stack Marketer: Demand Gen / Content / Digital Marketing / Marcom
May 16, 2013, Tim reported directly to Ann

Anyone who runs a marketing group these days knows that the role has expanded in many directions — almost overnight. This means you need someone who has a deep understanding of all the key marketing channels (web, direct, social, event, PR) and can tie them all together. Ideally, that person would bring a blend of creativity and pragmatism to all assignments, and apply a sensibility of both science and art to all programs and deliverables. And of course do all this calmly—even when under tight deadlines—and while maintaining a sense of humor. If you need these attributes for your marketing department, then you should talk to Ann. You'll find her to be experienced, flexible, dependable, a straight shooter, a great listener who provides candid feedback, diplomatic, and realistic about what can be accomplished given budget and resource constraints. I sincerely hope to work with Ann again, and would be happy to discuss any of the above with her fortunate future employer.

Tom played a pivotal role in nurturing and developing sponsorship and marketing relationships with Cleantech Open's strategic partners. I was impressed with Tom's deft and professional handling of our sponsors, which included top brands across many industries, each with differing requirements and expectations. Due to his diligence and tactful skills, the Cleantech Open now boasts some stellar partners that have enabled us to go from strength to strength. Tom would be an asset to any company looking for a leader who can engage with decision makers involved with global partnerships.

summary: Are you launching a company or product that needs media buzz to jump-start sales? Are your competitors getting all the media glory, while your splendid and planet-changing product is ignored?Perhaps you need help formulating a compelling messaging strategy that drives customer engagement across your website, blog and social media channels.I can help.I've successfully launched and publicized 100+ companies. http://zingpr.com/clients/CEOs, founders, CMOs and CTOs who need creative and expert PR, content development and brand storytelling services *without* the overhead of a larger marketing or PR agency tap ZingPR  to get their company on the map.We also partner with VC firms and accelerators who want to boost market awareness of their portfolio companies. We can collaborate with and complement existing management teams, adding valuable and cost-effective marketing expertise to spearhead media engagement campaigns.To learn more, contact me at: tim@zingpr.com.Visit calendly.com/zingpr/15min to schedule a 15-min chat.Or tell me how we can help solve your PR and marketing challenges right here:www.zingpr.com/yourstory
name: Tim Cox
title: PR & communications campaigns that drive business results
